meanings.definition: Extremely skilled or competent in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: She is an ultraprofessional pianist, playing with great skill and expertise.
meanings.sent2: The ultraprofessional surgeon performed the operation flawlessly.
meanings.sent3: Even the squirrels in the park admire her ultraprofessional nut-cracking abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraprofessional approach to gardening turned her backyard into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The ultraprofessional chef's dishes were like works of art on a plate.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a highly professional manner.
meanings.sent1: He always presents himself in an ultraprofessional way during important meetings.
meanings.sent2: The team's ultraprofessional conduct impressed their clients.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to act ultraprofessional by wearing a tiny tie to the office.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraprofessional demeanor was like a shield against office gossip.
meanings.sent5: The ultraprofessional attitude of the firefighters saved many lives during the crisis.

meanings.definition: Of the highest standard or quality in terms of professionalism.
meanings.sent1: The company's ultraprofessional services set them apart from their competitors.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer's ultraprofessional conduct in court earned her respect from all.
meanings.sent3: The penguin tried to be ultraprofessional by wearing a tie made of seaweed.
meanings.sent4: His ultraprofessional work ethic was a shining example to his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The ultraprofessional presentation left a lasting impression on the audience.
